title: The Healing Garden - Media Kit
author: Amanda Davis
description: Thanks for using our media kit to help spread the word about The Healing Garden: Cultivating and Handcrafting Herbal Remedies.
cleaned_text: The Healing Garden: Cultivating & Handcrafting Herbal Remedies Promotional Resources Thanks for helping to spread the word about Juliet Blankespoor's brand new book, The Healing Garden: Cultivating and Handcrafting Herbal Remedies! Our media kit contains sample text and images below to let folks know about the book and bonus content located at [HealingGardenGateway.com](https://healinggardengateway.com/) We're deeply appreciative of your support! Sample Facebook + Instagram Post Use the following sample text in Facebook and Instagram posts: Juliet Blankespoor's, The Healing Garden: Cultivating and Handcrafting Herbal Remedies just released and it's filled with all the finer things in life—luscious herbal cookery, floral adoration, and plant-human matchmaking! The book comes with a set of amazing free perks: 10 gorgeous videos on herb gardening and medicine making, 5 printable garden charts, and 100 pages of regional herb gardening profiles. Learn more about the book + the bonuses at the [HealingGardenGateway.com](https://healinggardengateway.com/). Sample Tweet Use the following sample text in Twitter posts: Juliet Blankespoor's, The Healing Garden: Cultivating and Handcrafting Herbal Remedies is filled with the finer things in life—luscious herbal cookery, floral adoration, and plant-human matchmaking! Learn about the book + the bonuses at the [HealingGardenGateway.com](https://healinggardengateway.com/). Photos and Gifs To download, click thumbnails to open full image in a new window, right-click, and "save image as". Social Media and Website Links Website, blog, and social media links for Juliet Blankespoor, The Healing Garden, and Chestnut School of Herbal Medicine: Juliet's Bio Use either version of Juliet's bio in promotional materials: Bio #1 Juliet Blankespoor is the founder of the [Chestnut School of Herbal Medicine](https://chestnutherbs.com/) (an online school serving thousands of students from around the globe) and the author of the bestselling book, The Healing Garden: Cultivating and Handcrafting Herbal Remedies. She's a bonafide plant geek, with a degree in botany and over 30 years of experience teaching and writing about herbalism, medicine making, and organic herb gardening. Juliet and her family reside in a home overrun with houseplants and books in Asheville, NC. Bio #2: Juliet Blankespoor is the founder of the [Chestnut School of Herbal Medicine](https://chestnutherbs.com/) and the author of the bestselling book, The Healing Garden: Cultivating and Handcrafting Herbal Remedies. She's a bonafide plant geek, with a degree in botany and over 30 years of experience teaching and writing about herbalism, medicine making, and organic herb gardening.
